mapper.select: select distinct SI."SchoolKey",SI."SchoolName" from ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION APIN, SCHOOLINFORMATION SI where APIN."SchoolKey" = SI."SchoolKey" and "IsPublish" = 1

select distinct MI."MajorKey",MI."MajorName" from ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION APIN,MAJORINFORMATION MI where APIN."SchoolKey" = #{schoolkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND APIN."MajorKey" = MI."MajorKey" AND "IsPublish" = 1
mapper.insert: insert into ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION() values (#{adminssionskey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolkey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorkey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminssionsnumber, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ispublish, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishtime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{offlinetime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createyear, jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION
"AdminssionsKey", "SchoolKey", "MajorKey", "AdminssionsNumber", "CreateTime", "IsPublish", "PublishTime", "OfflineTime", "CreateYear",
#{adminssionskey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolkey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorkey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminssionsnumber, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ispublish, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishtime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{offlinetime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createyear, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update: update ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION set schoolkey = #{schoolkey}, majorkey = #{majorkey}, adminssionsnumber = #{adminssionsnumber}, createtime = #{createtime}, ispublish = #{ispublish}, publishtime = #{publishtime}, offlinetime = #{offlinetime}, createyear = #{createyear} where adminssionskey = #{adminssionskey}
mapper.select: select count(1) from ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION ,SCHOOLINFORMATION , MAJORINFORMATION WHERE SCHOOLINFORMATION."SchoolName" LIKE '%${schoolname}%' AND MAJORINFORMATION."MajorName" LIKE '%${majorname}%' AND SCHOOLINFORMATION."ProvinceName" LIKE '%${provincename}%' AND ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."MajorKey"=MAJORINFORMATION."MajorKey" AND ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."SchoolKey"=SCHOOLINFORMATION."SchoolKey" AND ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."IsPublish"=1 AND ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."CreateYear"=(Select Extract(year from sysdate) from dual) AND ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."OfflineTime">(select sysdate from dual)

select count(1) from ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION a,SCHOOLINFORMATION s, MAJORINFORMATION m WHERE s."SchoolName"=#{schoolname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND m."MajorName"= #{majorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and s."ProvinceName"=#{provincename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a."MajorKey"=m."MajorKey" and a."SchoolKey"=s."SchoolKey" and a."IsPublish"=1 AND a."CreateYear"=(Select Extract(year from sysdate)-1 from dual)

SELECT ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."CreateTime", ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."CreateYear", ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."AdminssionsNumber", SCHOOLINFORMATION."SchoolName", MAJORINFORMATION."MajorName", ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."PublishTime" from ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION ,SCHOOLINFORMATION , MAJORINFORMATION WHERE SCHOOLINFORMATION."SchoolName" LIKE '%${schoolname}%' AND MAJORINFORMATION."MajorName" LIKE '%${majorname}%' AND SCHOOLINFORMATION."ProvinceName" LIKE '%${provincename}%' AND ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."MajorKey"=MAJORINFORMATION."MajorKey" AND ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."SchoolKey"=SCHOOLINFORMATION."SchoolKey" AND ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."IsPublish"=1 AND ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."CreateYear" >=trunc(sysdate,'YYYY') AND ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION."CreateYear" <=add_months(trunc(sysdate,'YYYY'),12)-1 ORDER BY "CreateTime" ASC

select * from (select tmp_tb.* , rownum rn from (SELECT a."AdminssionsNumber", s."SchoolName",m."MajorName",s."ProvinceName",s."CreateTime" from ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION a,SCHOOLINFORMATION s, MAJORINFORMATION m WHERE s."SchoolName"=#{schoolname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND m."MajorName"= #{majorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and s."ProvinceName"=#{provincename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a."MajorKey"=m."MajorKey" and a."SchoolKey"=s."SchoolKey" and a."IsPublish"=1 AND a."CreateYear"=(Select Extract(year from sysdate)-1 from dual) ORDER BY "CreateTime" DESC)tmp_tb where rownum <= ${pager.endIndex}) where rn>= ${pager.startIndex}
mapper.sql: a."AdminssionsKey", a."SchoolKey",s."SchoolName", s."ProvinceName",a."MajorKey",m."MajorName", a."AdminssionsNumber", a."CreateTime", a."IsPublish", a."PublishTime", a."OfflineTime", a."CreateYear"
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT count(1) FROM ADMINSSIONSPLANINFORMATION a left join MAJORINFORMATION m on a."MajorKey" = m."MajorKey" left join SCHOOLINFORMATION s on a."SchoolKey" = s."SchoolKey" WHERE 1=1 AND "CreateYear" = #{createyear}
AND "SchoolName" LIKE '%'||#{schoolkey}||'%'
AND "MajorName" LIKE '%'||#{majorkey}||'%'
AND "ProvinceName" LIKE '%'||#{adminssionskey}||'%'
